title: acer No 109 cm (43 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Android TV with Frameless Design  (AR43AP2851UDFLB)

product_specification.In The Box: LED TV :1N, User manual :1N, screws:4N, stand:1N for each side, remote control:1N, batteries:AAA: 2N.
product_specification.Supported App - Others: MX Player, Sony Liv, Voot, Voot Kids, Zee5, Spotify, Prime Music, Hungama, Google Music, Smart Player, Google Games
product_specification.Content Providers: Netflix, YouTube, Google Play Store, Prime Video, SmartCast
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear and Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: We'll facilitate the installation and demo through an authorized service engineer at your convenience. The service engineer will install your new TV, either on the tabletop (free of cost) or on the wall mount which will be chargeable. The charges are applicable for wall mounts as, Rs.499 for 70 Inch. All additional accessories not part of the package will be charged separately. The service engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features. The process generally covers Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested. Physical check of all ports, including power, USB ports, and Accessories. Demonstration of features and settings Quick run-through on how to operate the TV.

product_description.Borderless Design: Featuring a frameless design, the Acer AR43AP2851UDFLB Smart Android TV renders an edge-to-edge display with a 178-degree viewing angle for a truly engrossing experience. This way, regardless of where you're sitting in the room, you can watch and enjoy content with its wide viewing angle.
product_description.4K UHD Resolution: Thanks to its HDR10+ with HLG, this TV enhances the dynamic range and produces intense blacks and bright whites in 4K UHD resolution. This ensures that this TV offers true-to-life visuals for the content you're watching.

I have purchase this TV after the deep drive on product review. Since the acer top rated product in commercial, they are entering to consumer products.

I was in confusion till receiving the product. This is review after ten days of purchase. As a IT Techie, I have checked all the futures which is available in this TV and very much satisfied.

Also, I recommend everyone to purchase this TV without any hesitation. Awesome product within our budget.

Brand is Acer so buying a SMART TV in it was a no brainer.
Bought the product on the 25nd and got the delivery on the 31th.
AHS came and installed it on the same day.
Observations so far
1. Amazing picture quality, with natural full colours and brightness, is really great
2. Operating system is android working well
3. Sound output is what impressed me the most. Amazing sound for a TV in this segment.
4. Remote is sleek and easy to use. Hotkeys for Netflix & Prime are helpful. Something new in Tikilive so let's see.
5. Few buttons on the remote will only work when the system is updated to android 11, but it is no big deal.
6. Can do a better job with the installation and demo. They rescheduled once and then came in late.
Super happy with the product and will recommend it without a doubt.
Great job Acer again.

In this budget, the TV has almost all features, Google voice assist works super good, 24W speakers crispness os good, display is awesome, app store is good, chromecast in inbuilt, FastCast is also preloaded, all good features, delivery and installation also good, overall The Brand ACER and the device Smart TV are both Smart and awesome. Entire family liked this.

pros :

The TV really looks good in appearance. The sound quality is good with dolby system. The TV is wide range (178 Angle). It has 2 USB ports.

Its budget TV for middle class family

Cons :

I dont see any cons, I would like to highlight one point is that this is framless TV, so we need to handle it carefully.
